lawnlayer

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • lawnlayer.Enemy

  • public class Enemy
extends java.lang.Object
    Enemy class for multiple enemies

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Enemy(processing.core.PImage image, processing.core.PImage dirtImage, int x, int y, int dir, Map map, int type)
      Constructor of enemy

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkCollision(int x, int y)
      Checks for collision with concrete, grass, green or red from Path
      void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
      Draws enemy on screen - with minor adjustments depending on size of enemy image
      void eatGrass(int x, int y)
      Changes grass to dirt if beetle hits grass
      Direction getDir()
      Returns direction of enemy
      int getX()
      Returns x coordinate (in tiles) of enemy
      int getY()
      Returns y coordinate (in tiles) of enemy
      void tick()
      Handles logic for enemy at 60 FPS - moves diagonally, checks for collision and change directions accordingly, eats grass if enemy is beetle

      • Enemy

             processing.core.PImage dirtImage,
             int x,
             int y,
             int dir,
             Map map,
             int type)
        Constructor of enemy
        Parameters:
        image - image of enemy
        dirtImage - image of dirt tile
        x - x coordinate of enemy
        y - y coordinate of enemy
        dir - direction of enemy
        map - map for each level
        type - type of enemy (0 for worm, 1 for beetle)

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Handles logic for enemy at 60 FPS - moves diagonally, checks for collision and change directions accordingly, eats grass if enemy is beetle

      • getX

        public int getX()
        Returns x coordinate (in tiles) of enemy
        Returns:
        rounded x coordinate of enemy

      • getY

        public int getY()
        Returns y coordinate (in tiles) of enemy
        Returns:
        rounded y coordinate of enemy

      • getDir

        public Direction getDir()
        Returns direction of enemy
        Returns:
        direction that enemy is moving towards

      • checkCollision

        public boolean checkCollision(int x,
                              int y)
        Checks for collision with concrete, grass, green or red from Path
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of enemy
        y - y coordinate of enemy
        Returns:
        boolean - whether a collision has happened

      • eatGrass

        public void eatGrass(int x,
                     int y)
        Changes grass to dirt if beetle hits grass
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of enemy
        y - y coordinate of enemy

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Draws enemy on screen - with minor adjustments depending on size of enemy image
        Parameters:
        app - main papplet app
